timeline.bodyText:
No need to specify the type or required for any of these fields.
We deliberately avoid required as it limits schema evolution and all fields are optional from proto3 onwards.
timeline.author: ryanemerson

replies.bodyText:
ok didn't know that.
I was trying to avoid adding the default but I failed :)

I will move it to commons.
This class was in counters and I didn't want to create a cycle dependency between core <-> counters.
